entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 7:59AM AKST until February 01 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Cold winds chills to 50 below and blowing snow with low visibility occuring.
